Baby Cougars may look cute, but they have sharp claws and are deadly fast! They're almost impossible to hit, and they have the unique ability to ensnare the enemy's legs on the rare occasion that they find themselves at a disadvantage in battle. [npc_%objectId%_Link residence2/clanhall/farm_kel_mahum_messenger_6.htm|"I want to choose another NPC."] [npc_%objectId%_formAlliance 35622|"I want to form an alliance."]
